mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM apply_course a LEFT JOIN `user`u ON a.user_teacher_id = u.id LEFT JOIN course c ON a.course_id = c.id WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.id, u.user_name as userName, grade.grade as grade, grade.id as gradeId FROM stu_course stc LEFT JOIN `user` u ON stc.user_student_id = u.id LEFT JOIN stu_grade grade ON stc.user_student_id = grade.user_id WHERE stc.course_id = #{courseId} AND stc.user_student_id IN ( SELECT stut.user_stu_id FROM stu_teacher stut WHERE stut.user_teacher_id = #{userId} ) AND stc.`status` = 0
